Texts.Eng: Go to the Ancient Temple and explore it.

Texts.Chs: 切，那只是一个匆忙离去的笨蛋。我是否找齐了这里的所有宝藏？
Texts.Eng: Phew, that was quite a jaunt through the temple. Did I manage to find all the secret treasure?

Texts.Chs: 地图上显示出在这片沙漠中翼族古庙的坐标。
Texts.Eng: The map shows me the coordinates to an ancient avian temple in the desert wilderness.
